summary: This document describes two JMWAVE cover facilities: Ace Marine Survey, Inc. and Ceres Enterprises, Inc. Ace Marine Survey is used to provide cover for a maritime vessel, the M/V SONORA. Ceres Enterprises provided cover for maritime vessels, the M/V BARB and the M/V JADE, but was deactivated due to a security breach.
title: JMWAVE COVER FACILITY
